pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyze MS/MS Protein Melting Data // Software to aid in modeling and analyzing mass-spectrometry-based proteome melting data. Quantitative data is imported and normalized and thermal behavior is modeled at the protein level. Methods exist for normalization, modeling, visualization, and export of results. For a general introduction to MS-based thermal profiling, see Savitski et al. (2014) doi:10.1126/science.1255784.
